fxInfo_question: Does any court in the judiciary have the legal authority to invalidate governmental policies (e.g. statutes, regulations, decrees, administrative actions) on the grounds that they violate a constitutional provision?
fxInfo_scale: Dichotomous, converted to interval by the measurement model
